mapper.select: select p.project_id as projectId, p.project_name as projectName, p.contract_name as contractName p.contract_tel as contractTel p.version_name as versionName p.version_id as versionId from project p where p.is_del = 0 and p.project_id = #{projectId};
select f.file_id as id,f.file_name as name,f.url from file f where f.is_del = 0 and f.project_id = #{projectId}
